Package model

Class RubberBallModel

java.lang.Object
controller.BallController
model.RubberBallModel
public class RubberBallModel
extends BallController
RubberBallModel Class extends BallController Class creates the implementation of the RubberBall. Responsible for how its Shape should be created and defining its colours.
